logger.doc:name: Start Log
logger.message: transactionID: #[vars.transactionId], correlationId: #[vars.correlationId], message: "Started update covid case flow", payload: #[payload]

db:select.doc:name: Select Case by NationalID
db:select.db:sql: select case_id, source, case_type, first_name, last_name, phone, email, date_of_birth, national_id, street_address, city, state, postal, country, create_date, update_date from cvd_case_master where national_id = :national_id

ee:message.ee:set-payload:
%dw 2.0 output application/json skipNullOn="everywhere" --- payload map (covidCase, indexOfCovidCase) -> { caseID : covidCase.case_id, source : covidCase.source, caseType : covidCase.case_type, firstName: covidCase.first_name, lastName: covidCase.last_name, phone: covidCase.phone, email: covidCase.email, dateOfBirth: covidCase.date_of_birth as String {format: "yyyy-MM-dd"} , nationalID: covidCase.national_id, nationalIDType: covidCase.national_id_type, address: { streetAddress: covidCase.street_address, city: covidCase.city, state: covidCase.state, postal: covidCase.postal, country: covidCase.country, }, createDate: covidCase.create_date as String {format: "yyyy-MM-dd"} , updateDate: covidCase.update_date as String {format: "yyyy-MM-dd"} ,
}

%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "code": 404, "message": "Resource Not Found", "description": "the Server has not found, try again", "dateTime": now() as String {format: "yyyy-MM-dd"}, "transactionId": vars.transactionId }
